initialization.title: Initializing application
initialization.text: Please wait while we fire up the witch''s cauldron...

calculation.errorUnableToOptimize: The witch's assistant was unable to find a potion matching all desired effects. Try to remove some desired effects, or increase the cost limit, or start with a potion that uses e.g. one of each ingredient.

desiredEffects.title: Desired Effects
desiredEffects.errorNoEffectChosen: You need to choose at least one desired effect.

potion.title: Potion
potion.infoOrder: Add the ingredients in the right order!
potion.detailsOrder: Always add the ingredients with highest amounts first in order to get the lowest costs
potion.errorFourDiamondIngredients: Please select exactly 4 ingredients that need diamonds.
potion.errorMaxIngredients: You cannot use more than 25 ingredients in one potion.
